text:
22nd Street, north side, east from and including Avenue A.
May 6, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

Avenue A, east side, from 22nd to 23rd Streets.

May 8, 1929.

P.L. Sperr, Photographer.

folder: 22nd Street and Avenue A, Manhattan, N.Y.
text:
(1)
Police Department, Annual Outing: The head of the line of march on East 22nd Street between Ave. A and First Aves.

Summer 1936.

(2)
Children being entertained by a Department Glee Club group.

Summer 1936.
title: Police Department activities - Annual outing.

text:
Ave. A, east side, south from East 22nd Street, showing prominently buildings and plants of the Consolidated Gas Co. occupying the entire block from 22nd to 21st Streets and the S.E. corner of the latter. The 3-story structure with a flag pole atop bears No. 501 East 21st Street.

September 18, 1937.

George D. Chinn.
